DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this post-marketing surveillance is to obtain further information about the tolerability of Berodual® metered-dose inhaler in the treatment of chronic obstructive respiratory tract disease under conditions of daily practice
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Surveillance of Berodual® Metered-dose Inhaler in the Treatment of Chronic Obstructive Respiratory Tract Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients with diagnosis of Chronic obstructive respiratory tract disease Patients of either sex, including children over 6 years Contraindications listed in the Instructions of Use/Summary of Product Characteristics of Berodual® metereddose inhaler
